subcategory.name: Order Summaries
subcategory.description: Ecommerce order summary examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS order summary components to provide customers with a clear breakdown of their purchases, including itemized lists, quantities, prices, and total costs before completing their orders. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
